name.ja: <ruby>Ｋ<rt>ケー</rt></ruby><ruby>９<rt>ナイン</rt></ruby>－ＥＷ<ruby>特殊解除実験<rt>エクスペリメンタルリベレイション</rt></ruby>
name.ja_romaji: Kē Nain - Ī Daburu Ekusuperimentaru Ribereishon

text.en: Special Summon 1 "K9" monster from your hand or GY, then you can Special Summon 1 "K9" Xyz Monster from your Extra Deck, by using that Special Summoned monster as material (this Special Summon is treated as an Xyz Summon), but destroy it during the End Phase of the next turn. During the End Phase: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "K9" Quick-Play Spell in your GY; Set it. You can only use each effect of "K9 - EW Experimental Liberation" once per turn.
text.zh-CN: 此卡名的①②效果1回合仅可各使用1次。①：从自己的手牌・墓地将1只“K9”怪兽特殊召唤。然后，可从额外牌组将1只“K9”超量怪兽重叠在以此效果特殊召唤的怪兽上面，视为超量召唤特殊召唤。以此效果从额外牌组特殊召唤的怪兽将在下个回合结束阶段被破坏。②：在自己・对手的结束阶段，将墓地的此卡除外，以自己墓地的1张“K9”速攻魔法卡为对象可以发动。将该卡放置在自己场上。
